words.def: a furnace for firing or burning or drying such things as porcelain or bricks
the means of connection between things linked in series
a liquid used for printing or writing or drawing
a person having kinship with another or others
United States sculptor and architect whose public works include the memorial to veterans of the Vietnam War in Washington (born in 1959)
Ti, a plant native to the Pacific islands and China, Cordyline fruticosa.
a unit of length equal to one twelfth of a foot
a soft silver-white univalent element of the alkali metal group
